name: 4-Colors: Whex's Journey
description:
Whex is a WHite-HEX ! He felt by accident in the 4-colors world and needs to get out ! He can use his color-changing powers to change the world's color and uncover new paths... But also traps ! 

Will you be able to help him out ?

Arrows : Move & Jump
Space : Use your power !

This game was created for the 9th Geta Game Jam in 72 hours.

CREDITS
